code: import logo from"../images/vector.png";import{NavLink,useHistory,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(_ref){let{loggedIn,userEmail,handleLogout}=_ref;const history=useHistory();const location=useLocation();const isSignInPage=location.pathname==="/signup";const isSignUpPage=location.pathname==="/signin";const signOut=()=>{handleLogout();localStorage.removeItem("jwt");history.push("/signin");};const renderMenuItems=()=>{if(isSignInPage){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{className:"header__item",to:"/signin",children:"Entrar"});}else if(isSignUpPage){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{className:"header__item",to:"/signup",children:"Fa\xE7a o login"});}else if(loggedIn){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"header__item",children:userEmail}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:signOut,className:"header__item header__button",children:"Sair"})]});}return null;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"header__logo",src:logo,alt:"Logo da p\xE1gina Around the US"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"menu",children:renderMenuItems()})]});}export default Header;
